name: 2024 9th International Conference on Biomedical Imaging, Signal Processing
content: Paper Publication: ACM Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1749-9), archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI. Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), Cite Score: 2.7, which will be included in Scopus, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, etc.
